parameters.label: Max. Residual Diff. Ratio
parameters.name: maxResMagDiffRatio
parameters.descr: Used in match-point neighbor consistency check. Represents the maximum ratio (0-1) difference tolerated in residual magnitudes before flagging false match.

parameters.label: Min. Vector Residual Diff.
parameters.name: minVectorResDiff
parameters.descr: Used in match-point neighbor consistency check. Represents the minimum vector difference between residuals below which they are considered consistent. Used for accepting small but directionally varying neighbor residuals..

parameters.label: Max. Residual Angle Diff.
parameters.name: maxResAngleDiff
parameters.descr: Used in match-point neighbor consistency check. Represents the maximum angle difference (degrees) tolerated between residual azimuths before flagging false match.

parameters.label: % Consistent Threshold
parameters.name: percentConsistentThreshold
parameters.descr: Used in match-point neighbor consistency check. Represents the minimum required percentage (0-100) of the neighbor set that must be deemed consistent before accepting the match.

parameters.label: Min. Number of Consistent Neighbors
parameters.name: minNumConsistentNeighbors
parameters.descr: Used in match-point neighbor consistency check. Represents the minimum number of consistent neighbors needed to accept a match.

parameters.label: Number of Tie-points per Tile
parameters.name: numTiePointsPerTile
parameters.descr: Caps the number of tie-points, after filtering, to generate per tile.

parameters.label: Number of Features Per Tile
parameters.name: numFeaturesPerTile
parameters.descr: Defines the number of features to identify in the search patch.

parameters.label: Consider Alternate Matches
parameters.name: considerAltMatches
parameters.descr: If true, directs the consistency check to also consider secondary matches in neighbors before rejecting a match.

parameters.label: Do Two-way Feature Search
parameters.name: doTwoWaySearch
parameters.descr: If true, features are identified on both images of a pair. Otherwise, features are searched on the first image of the pair.

parameters.label: Feature Search Tile Size
parameters.name: featureSearchTileSize
parameters.descr: Side size o square tile in pixels for searching features.

parameters.label: Use Tile Grid Layout
parameters.name: useTileGridLayout
parameters.descr: If true, directs the feature search patch layout to use grid layout scheme.

parameters.label: Search Grid Size
parameters.name: searchGridSize
parameters.descr: The number of search tiles to layout along widest dimension of overlap.

parameters.label: Correlation Window Size
parameters.name: corrWindowSize
parameters.descr: Side size of the correlation kernel to use in computing cross-correlation.

parameters.name: diagnosticLevel
parameters.descr: For engineering output. For minimum verbosity, use 0

parameters.name: annotatedImageSize
parameters.descr: For engineering use. Defines the maximum side size of the annotated image being generated (if diagnostic level is appropriate). Leave as 0 to match the REF input image size

parameters.name: residualMultiplier
parameters.descr: For engineering use. Factor used to exagerate the magnitude of the residual vectors in the annotated image.
